## MapViewImageCache.registerImage() method

Register an existing image by name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerImage(name: string | undefined, url: string, image: ImageData | ImageBitmap | undefined): ImageItem;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string \| undefined | Name of the image from \[\[Theme\]\]. |
|  url | string | URL of image. |
|  image | ImageData \| ImageBitmap \| undefined | Optional \[\[ImageData\]\] of image. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md)
